content: in this legal case the viru county court issued a court order to terminate the proceedings between the claimant ap and the defendant rp the court confirmed a compromise reached by the parties which involved the division of their joint assets acquired during their marriage the defendant will retain sole ownership of one property while the claimant gives consent for the defendant to become the sole owner of another property the defendant also agreed to pay the claimant a total of 13500 euros in monthly installments the claimant waived any further claims against the defendant the parties will bear the costs of the proceedings and they have a shortened deadline to submit any appeals the court order will be delivered to the parties and the change in ownership will be formalized by the real estate department of the tartu county court any appeals must be filed within three days of receiving the court order the legal case was initiated on february 27 2023 when the claimant filed a lawsuit against the defendant in the viru county court requesting the division of joint assets the court dismissed the claim on march 2 2023 but gave the claimant 14 days to submit a corrected claim on march 16 2023 the claimants representative submitted a statement of claim to the court along with supporting evidence the claimant explained that they were married and divorced and that the defendant acquired a property as a gift the claimant argued that they contributed joint funds to improve the property the claimant also requested an expert appraisal of the property to determine the value of necessary expenses estimated to be 36000 euros they also signed a loan agreement with the defendant for the construction of an outbuilding and they want the defendant to compensate them for half of the loan balance additionally the parties acquired an immovable property a garage a car appliances and other items during their marriage the claimant estimated the value of these items and requested compensation the court reviewed the evidence provided by both parties and determined the compensation amounts for each item the court also mentioned that the parties were in a marriage that ended in november 2021 and that the defendant has already paid the claimant a sum of money as compensation the parties have now reached a compromise which includes the division of joint assets and payment of a sum of money to the claimant the court approves the compromise and terminates the civil case the parties are informed about their rights to file a new lawsuit or enforce the court order the court order also mentions the refund of the state fee paid by the parties the court will determine the distribution of procedural costs between the parties involved in the case
